## 1. Summary
The chat segment contains brief technical discussions about builder rights management in Hyperfy worlds. A key limitation was identified: builder rights can only be revoked when both the admin and the builder are simultaneously present in the world. The persistence of builder rights was confirmed - they remain even when users leave and return later. There was also a brief mention of a pull request (#134) related to Azure OpenAI endpoint integration, which someone implemented locally with success. A mobile version issue regarding image viewing and zoom functionality was raised. The discussion was relatively short with limited technical depth.

## 2. FAQ
